name: topojson-client
description: Manipulate TopoJSON and convert it to GeoJSON.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n topojson -o dist/topojson-client.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" -cm -o dist/topojson-client.min.js -- dist/topojson-client.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j dist/topojson-client.zip -- LICENSE.md README.md dist/topojson-client.js dist/topojson-client.min.js
